column5: woke up this morning thinking that the windss would have  calmed down from yesterdays 45km gustd....they did but not enough...now im sitting at home with the day off and i cant go fishing....just my luck ...out of the last four times i went out three of them were tough days cause of stronge winds....looks like the same weather as last summer......oh well cant sit inside when i could be fishing ...anyone want to hit the water anyways??
windy walleye?  not good for bass fishing but i always do wel for walleye in teh wind.  Be careful out there!  Cheers!

Yeah I hear ya I got blown off Simcoe a couple of weeks ago, I had planed to go to Simcoe again this Saturday with my boys but they are calling for high winds again all weekend and for me Simcoe + high winds = stay on Scugog.

Too funny, I was thinking the same thing,  too windy, just like last year, Everytime I wanted to head out in Erie the wind would pick up..  Humm maybe its time I put up a wind power generator, they you can be sure the wind would be calm each day.
have to agree, this summer has been very windy.  Have to stick to smaller bodies of water.
